Registration for SSBSE 2010 is now open.

To register, please complete the form available below, and either fax the completed form to +39 0824 1860151 or send by email to Massimiliano Di Penta (dipenta@unisannio.it).

Registration Form: PDF or DOC

The registration fees are listed in the table below. In addition to the symposium sessions and keynotes, the fee includes a copy of the proceedings, lunches, coffee breaks, reception and symposium dinner. Payment can be made by credit card or bank transfer.

TypeEarly Registration
(by August 15, 2010)		Late Registration
(after August 15, 2010)
Student350 Euro450 Euro
IEEE Member (non-student)450 Euro550 Euro
Full Registration500 Euro650 Euro
